form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Application for Status as a Under Section 2 of the Immigration and Naturalization Service, I-687

full_text: U.S. Department of Justice Application for Status as a Immigration and Naturalization Service (Under Section 245A of the Imm A92141101 Please begin with item #1, after carefully reading the instructions. The block below is for Government Use Only. Name and Location (City or Town) of Qualified Designated Entity Fee A92141101 Fee Receipt No. (This application) YH0811094086 $185.00 Principal Applicant's File No. A Qualified Designated Entity I.D. No. File No. (This applicant) 9/16/87 A - Applicant: Do not write above this line. See instructions before filling in application. If you need more space to answer fully any question on this form, use a separate sheet and identify each answer with the number of the corresponding question. Fill in with typewriter or print in block letters in ink. 1. I hereby apply for status as indicated by the block checked below (check block A or B). A Temporary Residence as an alien who illegally entered the U.S. prior to January 1, 1982. B Temporary Residence as an alien who entered the U.S. as a nonimmigrant prior to January 1, 1982 and whose authorized stay expired before such date or whose unlawful status was known to the Government as of January 1, 1982. 2. Family Name (Last Name in CAPITAL Letters) (First Name) (Middle Name) 3. Date of Birth (Month/Day/Year) ORDONEZ FELICITA 02/21/14 4. Other Names Used or Known by (Including maiden name, if married) 5. Telephone Numbers (Include Area Codes) Home: (818) 762-743 9 none Work: (213) 292-7404 6. Home Address in the U.S. (No. and Street), (Apt. No.) 1816 No. Stanley Ave. Los (City) Angeles, (State) California 90046 (ZIP Code) 7. Mailing Address in the U.S. (if different from #6.) (Apt. No.) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) same 8. Last Address outside the U.S. (City or Town) (County, Province or State) (Country) San Salvador El Salvador 9. Sex Male 10. Race Asian or Pacific Islander Black, not of Hispanic origin Other (specify below) Female Hispanic White, not of Hispanic origin 11. Marital Status Never Married Divorced 12. Country of Citizenship Now Married Separated Widowed El Salvador 13. Place of Birth (City or Town) (County, Province or State) (Country) San Salvador El Salvador 14. Have you previously applied for temporary residence as a legalization applicant? 15. Do you have any other record with I&NS? No Yes (if "Yes" give date, place of filing, and final disposition, if known) No Yes [If "Yes" give number(s)] A Other 16. When did you last come to the U.S.? (Month/Day/Year) 17. Manner of Entry (Visitor, Student, Crewman, etc.) of With visa (visitor, student, etc.) specify 09/1975 Without visa 18. Place of Last Entry 19. List all Social Security Numbers used. U.S. Port of entry (City and State) (1) none (3) Border - Not through port (State) San Isidro CA (2) (4) 20. Mother's Name (Maiden) (Last) (First) Living 21. Father's Name (Last) (First) Living Ordonez Antonia Deceased (year) 49 Roman Campos Deceased (year) 50 Form I-687 (04/01/87) Page 1
